professional_summary.title_experience: **Scrum Master / Performance Test Lead** with **15+ years** of comprehensive experience in software development and testing across **Client/Server** and **Web-based applications** in **Windows** and **UNIX** environments.
professional_summary.track_record: Proven track record of leading **enterprise-level migrations** (Windows Server 2016→2022, TFS→GitHub Enterprise) and implementing **automation frameworks** achieving significant efficiency gains.
professional_summary.expertise: Expert in **Performance/Load Testing**, **Test Automation**, **Agile/Scrum methodologies**, and building scalable QA processes across all phases of SDLC including **Manual/Automation Testing**, **System Integration**, **End-to-End**, **Regression**, and **UAT**.
professional_summary.core_value: Transform testing processes into comprehensive quality assurance strategies while leading cross-functional teams through complex technology migrations and continuous improvement initiatives.
